statements: SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, date, attendance FROM student_attendance WHERE class_id = 101 ORDER BY date;
SELECT student_id, participation FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance = 'P' AND participation > 80;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student_attendance;
SELECT * FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_id, class_id, date FROM student_attendance ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT student_id, class_id, participation FROM student_attendance WHERE participation > 90 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance = 'P'
SELECT student_id, class_id, date, attendance FROM student_attendance WHERE class_id = 5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM student_attendance;
SELECT student_id, date FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT student_id, date, attendance_status FROM student_attendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_participation WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, date, participation_score FROM student_participation WHERE participation_score > 80 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT student_id, date, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_participation WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY participation_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, date, attendance_status FROM student_attendance WHERE attendance_status = TRUE AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT DISTINCT student_id, date FROM student_attendance WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM student_attendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 5 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE Students.student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM Courses WHERE course_id > 5 ORDER BY course_name DESC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_id = Attendance.course_id;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT course_name, count(attendance_id) AS attendance_count FROM Courses JOIN Attendance ON Courses.course_id = Attendance.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING attendance_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_id FROM courses WHERE course_id < 5;
SELECT date FROM attendance WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT student_name, participation_score FROM students JOIN participation ON students.student_id = participation.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name, date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE date = '2022-01-01';

SELECT student_name, course_name, participation_score FROM students JOIN participation ON students.student_id = participation.student_id WHERE participation_score > 80 ORDER BY participation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, date FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 3 AND course_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, SUM(points) as total_points FROM Participation GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, course_id, date FROM Attendance WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id ASC;
